name: The Realm
description: The player lost in a village in another world is looking for a way out alone.

name: Planet Royale
description: Compete in the galaxy's most watched game show! Battle Royal on a planet that is being destroyed by a giant laser; each round players are eliminated as the world itself is destroyed and the escape pods become more scarce. Be the last person standing in a battle of wits, weapons and brute force.

name: Freestead Castle Defense
description: Build up your defenses, fortify your camp and fight back the demon horde that has come to take what little you have left.

name: Chushpan
description: Violent street gang wars have rocked the city. What do you remember about the main urban bands of the “USSR phenomenon” of the 1990s? Feel those times for yourself.

name: Blood & Dungeon
description: Blood & Dungeon is an action game that revolves around the struggle of a captured soldier to survive and escape from a dark and blood-scented dungeon

name: Slime Wars
description: 2D Strategy game.

name: Guardian Tactics: Deck of the Chosen
description: Command a squad of guardians in a thrilling deckbuilding, roguelike card battle to save the world from an Android army invasion. Fight, fall, learn, rise again!

name: Synapse
description: 「Synapse」is a game based on cooperative play with horror and thrills. Players must cooperate in a dark space to avoid robots, hack into facilities, and escape. The only thing players are given is a sense of helplessness and fear of death.

name: Sea of World
description: Battle Feel is a fun, survival, action-packed game that you can play online together also have a singplayer mode. The game takes place on an PvP Metro Map. Battle Feel has great graphics. Included types of game.

name: They Fear The Mist
description: They Fear The Mist is a real-time strategy game, where you command your Troops, build your Settlement, fight off thousands of Enemies and explore the Unknowns of the Mist. Take command of your people and defend them from the incoming hordes… Can you survive?

name: King Island 2
description: Embark on an adventure to uncover the mysteries of Kaptivo's transformation into an Arcane Warrior in this thrilling hack'n'slash action Flash RPG and sequel to King Island.

name: Murder Avenue
description: Welcome to the neon-lit, crime-ridden streets of 1970s New York in "Murder Avenue," an immersive first-person detective game that plunges players into a world of mystery and intrigue. Each crime scene reveals cryptic clues, leading you deeper into a labyrinth of deception and danger.

name: Booty Barrage
description: Command the defense of a pirate haven against relentless waves of enemy ships. As the guardian of your treasure-laden island, it's up to you to man the cannon and repel the invaders before they breach your defenses!

name: Dreadshot
description: Dreadshot is a fast and dynamic first-person shooter with parkour elements. The gameplay wants to combine all the best mechanics of modern shooters into a cohesive whole, аnd the plot is a deep satire on the current state of the gaming industry.

name: Cozy Marbles
description: Cozy Marbles is a small relaxing game about building your own marble runs. Create short & satisfying tracks or huge intricate marble machines. There's no rules or management - just sit back and experiment in this tiny physics sandbox.

name: Graveyard Shift
description: Scavenge, tiptoe, and fight your way to the surface in this dangerously cute puzzle and stealth game where everyone can hear—but not see—everything you do.

name: 2048: Dungeons
description: A game that mixes 2048 puzzle mechanics with a roguelite style of play, creating deadly battles where staying calm and thinking strategically are essential for victory. Make improvements, train your character, recruit allies and try your luck in the terrible dungeon of Blockshire.

name: Iz
description: In search of truth, pursuing the darkness… pixel RPG with adventure elements, based on Turkic myths in the setting of 15th century Kazakh steppes.

name: Sleeping Forest
description: Hey there, Legends! Dive into "Sleeping Forest" – where you lead a ragtag squad on a perma-death quest for glory! Round up buddies for local co-op, solve puzzles, and shape epic tales. It's medieval mayhem with a side of romance!

name: Shinzen Hollow
description: Embark on a journey in Shinzen Hollow, a captivating farm-sim RPG set in the Japanese highlands. Beyond farming, discover secrets, form bonds with NPCs, and tackle mysteries. With combat, crafting, and the beauty of changing seasons, experience a world filled with endless adventure and tranquility.

name: Bovine Battles
description: In a world where cows have gone crazy, you play as a cow and battle against other enemy cows for victory. This is a COD-Like shooter game where you battle against your friends, online opponents, or even aliens using goofy and powerful weapons and abilities.

name: Reports from Vera Cruz
description: Investigate the country of Vera Cruz in this journalistic first-person adventure! Solve puzzles, take photos of clues and report news exposing the horrific truths behind General Galba and his bizarre government!

name: Commandeer
description: This top-down sci-fi shooter features a unique “commandeer” mechanic that lets you hijack any ship you see. Take over star-fighters, cargo ships, and even entire battle stations. Explore a galaxy filled with dark humor, absurd characters, and strange environments on a quest to get your ship back.

name: Rhodesia '72
description: The first strategy game to capture the essence of the entire Rhodesian Bush War, from Llewellyn Barracks to BMAT (Jul '64 - Dec '79)

name: Placeground
description: PLACEGROUND is a building spaces simulation game with a focus on architectural design aesthetics. In this game, you have the opportunity to create and decorate both your interior and exterior spaces. Meanwhile, NPCs interact with your creations, crafting unique and abstract narratives.

name: Monster Mash
description: A wacky VR monster city destruction game! Use kooky mutated weapons and eat delicious, high-powered snacks, delivered by alien invaders as you take revenge on the evil pharmaceutical corporation that created you.

name: Soul #531
description: As a recently deceased ghost, you only remember one thing, You have to get back to your dog. Fight enemies and solve puzzles to escape the underworld in this action puzzle platformer. Explore the different layers of the underworld, and face challenges along the way, drawn in a charming 2D style.

name: Pai
description: In a mysterious world, the protagonist finds himself surrounded by monsters and robots. These monsters may come from another dimension, while robots are created by technologically advanced civilizations. The hero must uncover the secrets of the world and fight these monsters and robots.

name: Super Cubiform
description: As a Guildship Captain you must rely on your wits and a computer repair program to survive! Super Cubiform is a sandwich of genres, Arena Action Platformer + First Person Adventure! Enjoy arena-based platforming action as the Cubiform, and an urgent mystery as the Guildship Captain...

name: Cosmic Horror Tales
description: A top-down action RPG about a farmer searching for his chicken on the edge of a town filled with horrors beyond human comprehension.

name: Zako no Ahiru
description: You can't clear it, can you, mister? So lame, so lame ♡♡♡

name: Bro YuanShen Survivors
description: A survivor-like game where you control magic to kill monsters.

name: Vietnam '66
description: The successor to the critically acclaimed Vietnam '65!

name: TiaDar
description: TiaDar is an Action-Slasher game with RPG elements.

name: Warcos 2
description: Warcos 2 is a dynamic multiplayer shooter where you'll engage in battles on diverse maps, utilizing your skills, gadgets, and abilities to their fullest to overcome the enemy and snatch victory from their grasp.

name: Hardcore Survival
description: "Hardcore Survival" is a PvP-focused game where you start with a rock on a beach, build shelters, tame dinosaurs, and raid other players' bases in a prehistoric, dangerous world. Survive, dominate, or fall in this high-stakes adventure.

name: Gun And Sword
description: An idle game for casual players. Features combat in idle mode, crafting equipment, and managing a farm. Still in development.

name: Maximum Gas!
description: Maximum Gas! is an action-packed racing game designed for adrenaline junkies and speed enthusiasts who love the sound of roaring engines.

name: Super Harvester
description: This is a fun auto chess game. Choose and equip magic weapons, cultivate amazing plant and monsters. Build a team to penetrate the arena!

name: Casino Management Simulator
description: Run your own casino in "Casino Management Simulator"! Manage staff, games, and finances to build your gambling empire. Compete with rivals and keep guests entertained to become the ultimate casino tycoon!

name: Cathexis
description: Ancient pillars crumble into the sea. Cathexis, the power to remake this broken world, will be nothing more than scattered shards. Scale the towers. Unlock their secret chambers and awaken the relics within. Do what you must…before it all comes crashing down.

name: Tokyo Desire: Deck Builders
description: "Tokyo Desire" takes the deck-building roguelike genre in a bold and innovative direction, inviting players to weave their own narratives deep within the neon-lit depths of Tokyo.

name: Breathless: Will you Understand Me?
description: A cute romance kinetic novel with a mental health message

name: RTS Tactical Warfare: Siege Survival
description: The enemy attack on your base is imminent; secure your defenses, mobilize your troops, reinforce key positions, and get ready for the next battle. RTS Tactical Warfare will test your resilience and strategic prowess.

name: Code Red
description: Code Red is a first-person horror adventure game. Avoid the horrific creatures roaming the otherwise lifeless facility and survive the experience.

name: Toyful Wonderworld
description: A retro first-person game inspired by shooters of the 90s. Collect weapons and blast your way through the mysterious Toyful Wonderworld, where a cast of colorful enemies will stand in your way. Discover the secrets of this weird place and find out what has caused the Toyfriends to go crazy!

name: Fur and Fables
description: Dive into Fur & Fables, a party based bullet heaven roguelike! Assemble a party of adventurers, level up, and recruit new friends along the way. Experiment with party composition and synergies to fit your playstyle to save Fabletown from the endless hordes of monsters!

name: TLC Game BR
description: TLC Game is coming!, get ready to play!

name: Rigid
description: Rigid is a fast-paced game all about sick parkour action at high speeds.

name: The Unknown Strain
description: Embark on an epic journey where magic meets mystery in a vibrant world. Uncover ancient secrets, battle mystical creatures, and explore breathtaking landscapes. Your adventure begins now! Will you unravel the truths that are hidden behind family secrets?

name: Liar's Game
description: This is a social inference game, you and your companions lurking in the evil forces, find your right partner, in the mysterious maze, together to complete the task! The game has randomly generated splicing plots, and has a variety of classes and props to play, let you and your friends to have fun!

name: Angel
description: ANGEL is an PSX-era rhythm racer that imbues the flow state of racing with the complexity of breakbeat music to redefine arcade racing and combo-based gameplay. FFO: Breakcore, serial experiments lain, and existentialism

name: Nomadica
description: A new world exploration where you can do anything you want. Crafting, bulding, hunting, fishing, mining, farming, cooking, visiting villages, meeting native people, trading and exploring dungeons for better loot and uncovering mysteries of ruins and buried cities

name: Torso Tennis
description: Draft limbs, build your bod, then go head-to-head in rapid-action tennis matches against formidable foes. Sell your limbs, upgrade your limbs, get permaboost tattoos, and perfect your body-build to ace the season and clench victory in this thrilling run-based roguesports game.

name: Art of Blades
description: Art of Blades is a hand-drawn top-down isometric simple hack-and-slash. The art is inspired by Japanese manga and anime. The gameplay is a very simple hack-and-slash based on rock paper scissors. Scissors to attack, rock to block, and paper to dodge.

name: Gosdooma
description: In the magical land of Marsia, the most important day in the last 1000 years is approaching - the election of a new ruler! You have to vote for the right candidate or you will be sent to the front to fight for the survival of the great empire! Immerse yourself in a wonderful world with your shotgun!

name: Railpunk Mayhem
description: All aboard! Enjoy a unique, fast-paced roguelike action experience. In Railpunk Mayhem, survive relentless waves of enemies at breakneck speeds, build a powerful train to manage your crew, and strategically plan your route to the source of chaos.

name: Hateful Days
description: George Prinkerton gets caught in a time loop. For every person, this is something shocking and even terrifying. It would seem that a very simple young man is transported into the cycle of events that will forever change his life.

name: Mattami Restaurant & Cafe Tycoon
description: ♪ Mattami is a restaurant tycoon game where you start with a tiny humble place and work your way up. Manage your staff, their schedule and inventory to efficiently grow your restaurant as fast and as elegant as possible.

name: Cat Secretary
description: Keep your job by day. At night, sneak around the office and solve your colleagues' problems. Who's a good Cat Secretary? You are!

name: Fear & Hope
description: Can you help solve the mystery and more importantly do so before its too late?

name: Animal Rogues
description: Animal Rogues is a dark rogue-lite dungeon crawler bullet-hell with rpg elements. You play as an animal who fights against one possessed beast after another! Discover unique interactable objects such as slot machines, dices.. Collect magical items and level up to become more and more powerful!

name: Eclipse Breaker
description: Defeat the sun god and restore light to the world in this action roguelike. Face off against enemies and bosses in skill-based tactical battles that combine turn-based and real time combat. Progress through a godly realm as you get stronger by stealing the elemental power of your enemies.

name: GearGrit
description: Tansy Geargrit, charged with some crimes she did commit, and some she didn't... Explore, platform, and blast your way through GearGrit, an Action Platformer inspired by your favorite PS2 games!

name: The Choices We Make
description: Adding that feature before launching tomorrow might be the best or the worst decision of your gamedev life. Try to make the best game possible with the limited time you have in this world of unlimited consequences. Spend your time wisely, create, experiment, grow.

name: The Silent Bells
description: Dive into the eerie realms of "The Silent Bells," a spine-chilling horror anthology video game. Unearth five haunting stories, each a twisted tapestry woven from the threads of internet horror and creepypastas. Brace yourself, for every silent bell tolls the arrival of a new nightmare.

name: Cube Guy
description: Cube Guy is a 2.5D platformer with simple yet fun dodging, turn based boss battles, secrets, and a lot more!

name: Kami
description: Embark on the ultimate adventure in "Kami," a game that seamlessly blends action-packed roguelike exploration with deep strategic elements. Navigate through ever-evolving dungeons, harness the power of unique pets through evolution, and unlock extraordinary abilities.

name: Gelli Fields
description: Gelli Fields is a cozy farming game. Befriend magic slimes, travel the world, and enjoy fun activities like bug catching and fishing all to remove corruption from Continaa.

name: Snyatcher
description: Granny’s gone and the cats are going crazy! Solve this cat-astrophe by chasing the cats through this 3D platforming cat collectathon. Use your gadgets and athletic abilities to put a stop to the feline chaos and solve the mystery of Granny's disappearance!

name: Erlking
description: This is an adventure RPG with a focus on boss battles, defeating powerful enemies and gaining lots of equipment rewards. With different equipment to enhance yourself, challenge more powerful bosses and uncover the secrets of this fantasy world.

name: Xurb
description: Society has collapsed, use any means to survive in XURB. Loot and shoot your way out of intense PvPvE raids. Use what you find to build up a camp, and recruit survivors you find along the way to help you. Play solo, or with friends, and explore the dangerously desolate exurbs.

name: Zoe Begone!
description: Hand-drawn bullet-hell! A frenetic shooter combining the run-and-gun mechanics of Metal Slug with the infinite loops and shmup-ing of Resogun, wrapped up with old-fashioned drawn-on-film style animation. Fight your own creator as the artist bears down on you with pen and paintbrush!

name: Nonu
description: Nonu is a fantasy souls-like set in a beautiful hand-drawn world. Face intelligent enemies in true souls-like fashion, with a unique twist. Draw upon the power of Nonu to forge your own fighting style, and uncover untold truths about the world, and its inhabitants.

name: Strongest Angel Zerachiel!
description: In a city that worships the Goddess of Fortune, an angel descends. Her name is Zerachiel. Zerachiel struggles to rescue her comrades who are imprisoned by the cult, but she is defeated and stripped of her powers by a girl claiming to be a saint...

name: 7 Days Blood Moons
description: 7 Days Blood Moons is a 4v1 fight to the death. Survivors fortify bases and scavenge for materials in their plight against the relentless horde. The Zombie Hive Master commands and possesses the horde to crush the survivors. Who will prevail?

name: Untraveled Lands: Chantico
description: Explore the wild depths of "Untraveled Lands: Chantico" a captivating card-based survival management game mixed with roguelike elements. Build a village, manage survivors, craft essential items and equipment. Unravel jungle mysteries to find your way home through a world lost in time.

name: Mooon
description: MOOON is a miniature theme park beyond earth. Controlling remotely, switching between giant and mini avatars, passing scaled houses and 3D puzzles. Who am I? Explore in this unique 2.5D platformer!

name: Let's be a Tiger
description: Let's Be a Tiger is an exciting and immersive game that puts you in the role of a powerful tiger in the wild.

name: Hangar 1914
description: Become a hangar worker, your task is to repair and maintain aircraft during World War I. The fate of these sky machines and their pilots is in your hands - start your adventure on the front of World War I.

name: Curling in the Dungeon
description: The princess must be rescued and the mighty dragon killed! You're the perfect candidate, here is your sword, shield and... curling stones? Nevermind, there's no time to lose! Countless of enemies, items, powerfull relics, fancy characters and unexpected events are waiting in the dungeon!

name: Cowboy vs. Zombies
description: In this thrilling fusion of roguelike, first-person, and third-person gameplay, every decision you make matters.Explore the surrounding area for valuable resources and other survivors. Armed with your trusty six-shooter and a pickaxe, confront the relentless zombie onslaught.

name: Inferni: Hope & Fear
description: Inferni: Hope & Fear is a unique combination of deck builder and battle royale, creating the world’s first 8 player online coop card game.

name: Juice
description: Enjoy the binge of a ravenous Monster vs the last stand of a lone survivor in this dual narrative fps about the end of the world!

name: Attack of The Worker
description: "Attack of the Worker" is a rogue-lite, pixel-style bullet shooting game where players experience the life of a worker in a tech company.

name: Play Together Lite
description: Compete with your friends, family and frenemies in this party game collection! Use your phones or tablets as your controllers, supports 2-8 players! Action games, turn-based, board games, we have it all! More games coming soon!

name: Unseen: 2007
description: Reality is a canvas painted with lies.

name: Freak Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Your letter has been rejected.
description: Sin descripción

name: Medieval March
description: Medieval March is a medieval survival game where you can fight for survival with a medieval theme. You can invade villages with your own team and start new wars against your opponents.

name: Zombie Royale
description: Get ready for a battle royale experience full of zombies on a huge map for 100 players

name: Murder
description: Are you ready for an adventure where you become a detective or a murderer in multiplayer? Become a detective or a murderer in Murder

name: LAN Party
description: Experience online gaming like never before! LAN Party is designed to be the perfect compliment to your gaming group. Whether you're playing the same game competitively, cooperatively, or playing different games entirely, LAN Party makes communicating and sharing gameplay so much easier.

name: Multiverse Battle Royale
description: Multiverse is the ultimate real-time, world-switching battle royale! Engage solo, or assemble a team to overcome the Multiverse challenges. Adapt, survive, and conquer across ever-changing realms. Claim your place as the multiverse champion!

name: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
description: Social fishkeeping is back! Tiny Aquarium is a real-time online aquarium simulator. Breed and sell fish, decorate, and visit your friend's aquariums with bite-sized daily sessions.

name: Roadway Traffic Racer
description: "Roadway Traffic Racer" is an exciting and thrilling game for lovers of high-speed racing on the highway.

name: Stellar Outpost Commander
description: Stellar outpost commander is a real-time strategy game with indirect control, where you have to build a base, explore the surrounding space, discover new technologies, and, of course, hire pilots, each with their own character, and assign them a ship corresponding to your mission objectives.

name: Seka II
description: Lead a fearless team of mice up to 8 players through challenging test chambers! Dodge traps, battle foes, break barriers, collect cheese, and uncover the secrets behind the experiments. Join the mission now!

name: Interstate Cowboys
description: Interstate Cowboys is a role-playing game set in Neo Vista City, a mix of 80s aesthetics and near-future technology. It features dual protagonists with AI-generated NPC dialogues, dynamic relationships, immersive synthwave aesthetics, a blend of RPG elements with arcade driving, and heist planning.

name: Avelia
description: Delve into a low-poly survival adventure. Craft, build, thrive, breed animals, master fishing, farming, face formidable bosses. Elevate skills with stats, levels, a skill tree. Equip magic, bows, and swords to survive and dominate in a captivating medieval world

name: Wolves in Sheep's Clothing
description: In this asymmetrical multiplayer game, players are either cunning wolves, disguising themselves among sheep to hunt, or vigilant farmers tasked with protecting their flock. Master deception and strategy in a tense battle of wits.

name: A Good Night's Rest
description: Face monsters from the depths of your subconscious by night and the trials of young adulthood by day in this hand-drawn turn-based tactical RPG. Make friends and manage resources to maintain your mental health and finally get.. A Good Night’s Rest.

name: Morn
description: As a minister of the church and a founding member of the prestigious and secretive Helsing Society, it is your job to banish the world of the unholy. Rage war against maleficent entities such as; vampires, werewolves, demons and their worshipers to cleanse Gods kingdom of the evil festering within.

name: Forest Hills: The Last Year
description: Enter the nightmarish world of Forest Hills, where you and four other Displaced try to survive, fight back and ultimately escape a horrifying Fiend in this unique horror asymmetric game.

name: Sleep Terror
description: The game "Sleep Terror" is a horror adventure game that tells the story of a teenager waking up at night in his own dream. Travel to different places in your head to get out of the nightmare

name: Survival Z The Alpha
description: Be the First Zombie and Start a Great Achievement:Infect the Whole World,Grow your Zombie Poplulations.

name: Pawnholm
description: Island survival RTS rogue-lite, with mysteries behind every corner. Assign your pawns to craft, build, explore, and upgrade your kingdom. Every randomly generated island holds unique secrets to be uncovered. As the Duke of Pawnholm, will you lead your pawns to prosperity ...or to calamity?

name: Dowon
description: This game features captivating storytelling, rich interactivity, diverse puzzles, and branching narratives based on player choices. As players guide Nara through various events, they'll develop relationships with male characters, solve puzzles, and shape the story's outcome through their decisions.

name: Graytail
description: Graytail is a Zelda-like action-adventure game with interactive puzzles and combat set on a small island in the Pacific. Find the missing best female pilot and uncover the secrets hidden on the island.

name: Truck Job
description: A casual truck driving game. Deliver the cargo safely through different obstacles, challenges and enemies.

name: The Chronicles of Penghao: Ming
description: "The Chronicles of Penghao: Ming" is a 3D action RPG game where players assume the role of an ordinary person during the late Yuan and early Ming Dynasty, witnessing the ebb and flow of countless lives amidst the historical currents.

name: Fudgy Dice
description: From the fusion of dice games and deckbuilders rises a brand-new dice-builder. Embark on a crazy roguelike adventure with ramping relics and (literally) exploding dice or challenge your friends in local multiplayer with one of 7 unique characters.

name: Pixel Quest: Survivor
description: In this action roguelite with unique and themed characters, create your build and face hordes of enemies with up to 4 friends online, kill monsters, collect their souls, face bosses and survive!

name: Wijita: City of Makers
description: Simulate electronics, code robots, personalize your dream workshop, and connect with other passionate makers online.

name: Mango Goes to Mewsic School
description: Mango Goes to Mewsic School is a cute rhythm game where you play as a cat, Mango, trying to get into music school. Traverse a trap-laden environment to learn from the masters, who will teach you the basics of four different music genres.

name: Kunkun Battles
description: In a 3D roguelike survival and crusade game, constantly acquire changing characters and skills to survive fighting against various enemies. Hold on for 12 rounds, and then the BOSS appears! You're going to shoot them. You will be number 1 forever If you are ikun, you are happier

name: SokoFarm
description: SokoFarm is a Sokoban puzzle game with bright, cosy visuals and cute characters played out in a sleepy rural setting. Roll Chonky Chickens, Ducks and Geese to their preferred nests in the fewest moves possible. Play through the seasons to see new farms and features for even more brain teasing fun!

name: Confiscator
description: Combining intense action and dark storytelling, Confiscator offers a unique experience where gritty shootouts and grime intertwine with the tragic tale of the protagonist on a path of self-destruction. Are you ready to become a confiscator?

name: Rekesh Gaal
description: You are a wanderer chosen to fight evil. Choose your path, explore gloomy locations and find secret places. Defeat your enemies through complex character development, hundreds of unique items and crafting.

name: Mad Skills Motocross: Chasing the Dream
description: Mad Skills Motocross: Chasing the Dream is an authentic motocross racing experience that was developed by riders, for riders. It perfectly blends arcade-style mechanics with realistic track layouts and rider movements. Get ready to experience the thrill of motocross racing like never before.

name: ESC
description: Experience the art of hacking as you unravel hidden secrets and accomplish intricate objectives. Type your commands to navigate the systems and unveil hidden secrets.

name: Kitty Kitty Bounce Bounce
description: Good old-fashioned arcade game in which you bop around a kitty using various cushions. Your goal is to break all breakable block without falling onto the floor. Difficulty levels, in-game shop where you can buy pick-me-ups with points you get for destruction, cute art and soundtrack, and much more!

name: Secrets of the Tundra
description: Secrets of the Tundra is a 2D Top-Down Boss Rush game inspired by Shadow of the Colossus, Titan Souls, and Zelda. You are a greedy man in search of riches in the Tundra. Destroy the spirits to get what you always desired but for what price? Go forth and find the Secrets of the Tundra!

name: No Observer
description: First day on the job, and dispatched after a distress call you, find yourself in the middle of a threat filled mansion. Fight or run. Manage your inventory. Discover puzzles and bring to light the mystery within the mansion walls.

name: Fortune Deck
description: «Every card tells a story; your kingdom's fate rests in how you weave them together.»

name: Shards Between Us
description: With their family and home on the brink of collapse, two magical sisters must find a way to grow together. Join their coming of age journey in this healing, heartfelt head-scratcher.

name: Sled Builders
description: Physics-based sled-building game where only your imagination is the limit. Wishlist now!

name: Song of Eriel
description: "Song of Eriel" aims at building a game world with a deep economic and social system. Every NPC is vividly alive, with their own decisions and full range of emotions, naturally giving rise to a variety of stories. Here, you can chart your own course and author your distinctive saga.

name: BioChaos
description: A single-player/multiplayer adventure game with survival elements set in a post-apocalyptic world, featuring a top-down perspective on reluctant travelers with their own objectives. Galdan's goal is to bring the girl to a "home," while Ceder aims to change the world for better or worse.

name: Antidote City Hall
description: You play as a former policeman who founded a private detective agency. Investigate a chain of mysterious murders, plunge into the world of crime, gain former glory, restore your good name. An exciting storyline, explore the city, a lot of characters, an atmosphere of fear and hopelessness.

name: CDZ
description: Have you ever wanted an apocalypse to happen just so you could snoop through your neighbors belongings? CDZ aims to create a more realistic survival horror game based off real earth data and landmarks. Can you make it across the entire planet?

name: Huedini
description: Huedini is a top-down action roguelike game. Play as Huedini, a powerful wizard with the ability to change his colour. By matching your colour, to that of the enemies you can absorb their colour essence. By combining these colour essences into the correct combination, you can cast custom spells.

name: Contract & Control
description: Embark on an electrifying journey in a role-playing extravaganza with mind-bending features that'll whisk you to new realms! Get ready for an adventure that'll leave you breathless and craving more! Brace yourself, this game may actually blow your mind!

name: Miracle Corp.
description: Miracle Corp. is a metagame and a Metroidvania game. In the story, you will play a mysterious retro game developed by Miracle Corp., guided by an AI tour guide. Uncover the hidden truths behind the game.

name: Katana Dynasty
description: Every decision you make shapes the destiny of Kaito and the fate of the city. Will you choose the path of honor, exposing the truth and restoring justice, or succumb to the allure of power and manipulation?

name: Polyzone
description: "Polyzone" is a dynamic war zone where strategy, skill and style collide. Enter the polygonal battlefield, customize your loadout, and join the epic multiplayer experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Get the demo for free now and become the best futuristic warrior!

name: Pew Pew vs. Monsters
description: Pew Pew vs Monsters is an action-packed arena shooter with roguelike elements. Play as a seasoned monster slayer, blast your way through hordes of fast enemies and improve your skills in order to confront the mother of all monsters.

name: Knightborn
description: Be a Warrior, Mage, Archer, or Priest and rise as Knightborn! Explore a hand-painted world, loot enemies, and adventure with friends. Reconnect with classic RPG magic!

name: Electric Alps
description: You are an electrician, moving back to your hometown in the Austrian Alps, which you find lacks a certain... spark. Promptly tasked with wiring up the village, you solve electrical puzzles, blow fuses and master real-world circuitry techniques. Electrify the Alps, one circuit at a time.

name: Sire
description: Sire is a narrative card game about the complicated relationship with parents, and dealing with their inevitable death. Combine cards to explore a darkly comedic, surreal world.

name: Nientum: Opus Zero
description: Nientum - Opus Zero is a 2D action game that brings platformer, runner and music interactive genre all together. A fantastic journey of the director and singer, and the storytelling of music from the world. Run through the stage to complete their fate!

name: Perfect Dark Zero
description: What was originally intended to be a launch title for the GameCube, but Microsoft buyout of Rare resulted in the game’s development being moved to the Xbox, but in the end it became a launch title for the Xbox 360.

name: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo
description: Are you ready for the first Yoyovania?! In this 2D top-down adventure you'll explore a sprawling urban landscape, reinterpreting your surroundings through your mastery of yoyo tricks. Combine moves for traversal, fight the city's rival crime lords, and regain the influence of the Pipistrello family!

name: Too Human
description: What started off as something for the PlayStation and later the GameCube before finally releasing for the Xbox 360.

name: The Gap: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Unicorn Overlord: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Read Only Memories: Neurodiver - Collector's Edition
description: Each copy of the game includes: physical copy of the game on Nintendo Switch/PlayStation 5, art book, NEURODIVER plush, double-sided acrylic charm featuring ES88, prismatic sticker sheet, instruction manual, soundtrack download card, collector’s edition box.

name: MotoGP 24: Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Looper
description: Escape the dungeon using the Looper — a cutting-edge technology that lets you fold the space itself.

name: 240p Test Suite
description: The 240p test suite is a homebrew software suite for video game consoles developed to help in the evaluation of capture cards, upscalers, upscan converters, line doublers and of course TV processing of 240p video and scaled signals.

name: Dark Souls: Archthrones
description: Dark Souls: Archthrones is a fan-made mod for Dark Souls that aims to enhance and expand the original game. It introduces new content, such as additional weapons, armour, spells, and items. The mod also rebalances gameplay elements, updates enemy placements, and adds new areas to explore.

name: Lunch with Ronan
description: Lunch with Ronan is a NSFW standalone side story of Notes of Hearts, where you take on the role of Ronan's co-worker.

name: Reboot Heroes
description: Assemble a team of androids to take down the AI overlord in this rogue-lite, card-drafting, auto-battle adventure! Each Hero brings a unique card-pool and will help you master the elements of this augmented world.

name: Anime Hero Zero 3
description: Anime Hero Zero 3 is an unofficial Guitar Hero II mod for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime music. The game is the third entry to the Anime Hero Zero series.

name: Anime Hero Zero 2
description: Anime Hero Zero 2 is an unofficial Guitar Hero II mod for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime music. The game is a sequel to Anime Hero Zero.

name: Anime Hero Zero
description: Anime Hero Zero is an unofficial modded version of Guitar Hero II for the PlayStation 2 which adds anime songs into the game.

name: Jump Burger
description: Jump Burger is a rumored Nintendo Entertainment System game. It is believed that the game would become part of the game ShortOrder & Eggsplode.

name: SuperSquad.GG
description:
Get ready for an epic adventure where you must fight off hordes of monsters and create your Super Squad with unique abilities to defeat them!

Explore different environments as you battle through waves of monsters. Use your deck to strategically choose the best squad of heroes to take on each challenge and defeat the most imposing foes.

name: Palps
description: Palps is a cancelled Famicom Disk System game. The game would have involved a mixture of programming and gameplay. It is believed that the player would have not have been controlled by themselves, but rather that the player would program how they react to other things around them.

name: Bowling
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey Math School Sunshine
description: Numeracy and fundamental math skills can be difficult to present to young players, and Monkey Math School Sunshine is designed to navigate those challenges. With Milo by their side, kids will move from basic counting to addition, subtraction and complex pattern recognition. By keeping the games focused, and through the utilization of our Knack Technology, we instinctively adjust the challenge levels to each individual player.

name: Flaming Flagon
description:
Flaming Flagon is a romances + nsfw VN set in a fantasy world populated with anthro "mon" characters.

In this game, you will work in Flaming Flagon, a tavern popular among adventurers. Here you will get to meet all sorts of adventurers and co-workers, learn their stories and finds your own path in this world.

name: Dangerous Galaxy
description: Build your ship abilities in a creative way to destroy the evil foes that await you in the dangerous galaxy. A roguelike experience with physics-based combat, resource management, and freedom to play your way.

name: Spellcard Academy
description: A roguelike deckbuilder where you play as a witch studying wacky schools of magic like Llamamancy and Spookymancy. Summon monsters to fight for you. Scrounge together components to cast powerful spells. Mix and match spell combos as you journey for lost astral knowledge.

name: OneState
description: OneState is the world's first RolePlay game with an open world and 500+ people online in one map! Choose your own path in OneState!

name: Charlie Brown’s All-Stars
description: An unreleased baseball based off the Peanuts series.

name: Maverick Hunter
description: What was supposed to’ve been a first person shooter in the Mega Man universe developed by Armature Studios, only to get cancelled after 6 months of development.

name: Carrier 2: The Next Mutation
description: An unreleased sequel to the Dreamcast game Carrier. Why it got cancelled is believed to do with Jaleco's financial troubles at the time.

name: DungeonTomb
description: "DungeonTomb" immerses players in dungeon exploration, shooting, and adventure. Delve into the mysterious underworld, confront endless mazes, and battle vicious monsters. In this perilous kingdom, face thrilling battles, explore ruins, and unlock powerful weapons. Challenge reflexes and strategy!

name: Strashna 2
description: Explore a mansion that is constantly changing, finding clues that will help you discover the history of this house. This place has many surprises and secrets, so keep your eyes peeled.

name: Spells and Sacrifice
description: A Lovecraftian dungeon crawler, learn occult spells to survive and descend through the scourge pit. Find that which was imprisoned long ago.

name: OCRPG
description: An Arcade Styled RPG with surprises, laughs and horrors at every turn.

name: Micro Stream RPG
description: A tiny, auto-play RPG for Twitch streamers to engage with their chat. Let your viewers battle through dangerous dungeons and tough enemies, all in the background while you stream!

name: Survivors
description: "Survivors" is a first-person shooter roguelite experience. Armed with four weapons, engage in intense battles against diverse enemies, confront bosses, and strive to survive until the end. Making choices among items and enhancing your character's capabilities through purchases in the shop.

name: Flawed Tactics
description: Build an unstoppable team of adorable characters ready to destroy all enemies!

name: Card Racer
description: Unleash the ultimate adrenaline rush with Card Racer — a fusion of exciting car combat and intricate card tactics!

name: Pursuit of Laughter
description: Your spirit has been reawakened by the Jester God and you must embark on a journey where humor and darkness intertwine, navigate mysteries with laughter as your guide in a world where whimsy shadows logic.

name: Drill Hero Legend
description: 2D action-adventure platformer with a drill-head hero! Get ready to drill and blast everything in front of you in this challenging game made by fans of classic 90s platformers! Shoot, slide, enter tubes and be launched by cannons, drill everything in your path!

name: Big Ear Detective
description: Ironic point & click adventure where a once brilliant detective quits his trade to test software and make a living. But even in the seemingly mundane world of office life, there are secrets to be uncovered. Navigate through puzzles, quirky colleagues, and intrigues to crack corporate mysteries.

name: Fortuna Deluxe
description: Survive waves of enemies raining bullets on you with the help of your trusty Automatic Turret Machines (ATMs) while you focus on more important priorities: making bank. It's equal parts bullet hell, tower defense, incremental game, and rogue-lite. Coming out later this year in 2024!

name: Gnomemade
description: Gnomemade is a card-based baking game where you manage a gnome-run bakery, satisfy your fellow gnomes' specific tastes by creating all kinds of traditional, weird, wacky and even mystical creations!

name: Don't Look at Him
description: a horror game that takes place in a forest. complete tasks, and don't get caught.

name: Dark Passage
description: Delve. Explore. Discover. But most importantly, get out of the Dark Passage alive. Be the first to discover hundreds of ancient artifacts in this first person treasure hunt inspired by classic early 3D dungeon crawlers.

name: SCP-9735-Alpha: Arch1tect
description: In SCP-9735-Alpha: ΔRCH1TECT, you step into the shoes of Jasmin Kimura, a scientist from the SCP Foundation. Your mission: Explore SCP-9735-Alpha, document findings, complete challenging tasks, and survive!

name: Elderwood Online
description: Dive back into the essence of MMORPGs with Elderwood Online, where we pay homage to the beloved classics of the late '90s and early 2000s, infused with a touch of today's innovation. Elderwood Online marries the nostalgia of golden-age MMOs with fresh adventures and discoveries.

name: Bleak Remastered
description: Immerse yourself in the dystopian world of Pinnacle with BLEAK Remastered. Experience stunning new artwork and enhanced gameplay in this dark adventure. Can you navigate the relentless hostile world and save your sister, Asha?

name: Nauts
description: Nauts is a space action roguelike. Run and develop your civilization in a mysterious and dangerous universe. Knowledge will be your best tool: explore and discover what is hidden in to the Cosmos while surviving as many dangers that will appear on your journey.

name: Jail Escape Plan VR
description: Launch the escape plan step by step and break out to prove your innocence in this VR prison-themed open-world escape game!

name: Careful Gardeners
description: Fight pests and insects to protect your garden!

name: Devil Jam
description: Devil Jam invites you to plunge into the fiery depths of hell, where every note is a weapon and every step sets the rhythm of battle! Engage in intense, fast-paced runs as you mow down legions of hellish fiends to the pulse of the underworld. Defeat their overlords, and overthrow Hell itself!

name: Isekai Infinity: Worlds Unleashed
description: Accidently loosing her life, Aria finds her self in the spirit realm...her new life simple and relaxing is torn apart once more as she is thrust into another world. Will she have any OP skills in this new world? She must find her way back but finds that each time she fails another world awaits.

name: Highlighters: Cosmic Puzzle Action
description: Highlighters is a fast-paced, match-4, action puzzler inspired by the likes of Tetris Attack and Puzzle Fighter, prioritizing quick thinking and quick thumbs. Featuring stylish pixel art, addictive gameplay, and out-of-this-world music!

name: Pepper
description: Dive into 'Pepper,' a mesmerizing souls-like RPG where monsters roam and mysteries await. Engage in branching dialogue, crafting your destiny with every decision. Explore diverse endings in this captivating fantasy world. Are you prepared to shape your legend in 'Pepper'?

name: Dark Pact
description: Fast turn-based strategy with a focus on creativity rather than number crunching. Manipulate enemy positioning and use the environment to your advantage. Utilize clever combo's to defeat overwhelming odds.

name: Cursed Canvas
description: Explore the cursed location, find and destroy the haunted objects while avoiding the ever-looming Cursed Canvas! When the Cursed Canvas finds you, you will encounter the fear that lies deep within your heart.

name: Dr. Alb's Prodigy
description: Dr. Alb's Prodigy is a Roguelike Action RPG which combines turn-based and real-time combat. Play as a bio-mechanical android and help the doctor prevent the apocalypse.

name: Ring Craft
description: In "Ring Craft," you will play as a ring forging master, using various materials to add useful or useless attributes to the rings. You will explore the secrets of nutrition, oop, I mean, enchantment. Whether it's miracles-craft or disaster-craft, it's all up to you!

name: Patient No. 26
description: Patient No. 26 is an exciting horror game where the player finds himself in the dark world of an abandoned laboratory, where a sinister doctor conducts creepy experiments on his patients. You are patient No. 26 and you are fighting for your life, overcoming the challenges set by a mad doctor.

name: Synthetica: Cyber Club Manager
description: Run your own futuristic club in a world where high-tech meets fun nights out. Make your club the best by customizing android staff, pleasing different kinds of guests, and handling all the challenges of being the boss. Every choice you make shapes your club's success. Dive in!

name: Chomper
description: Are you ready for a challenge? Build, research, craft, and defend in this arcade-style, dynamic real-time strategy tower defense game. Defend the core at all costs. There are no mistakes.

name: Nose: Breathing Rebellion
description: Face factories of hate and gas-filled tubes to liberate the city in this 2D action-platformer set in a dark satirical world filled with puzzles and adventure. Welcome to a future, or past, dystopia where your determination pave the way to liberation.

name: Fight 'N' Jokes: Storylines
description: Dive into 'Fight'N'Jokes: Storylines', an episodic 3D adventure game where puzzles, quick-time events, and rich dialogues bring the story to life. Explore the lives of iconic characters, make impactful choices, resolve conflicts, make new friends, and rise to become the true champion of the realm.

name: Radioquacktive
description: Have you ever wondered how a duck would survive a Nuclear Apocalypse? If you want to survive the flooded wastelands, you will need to quack enemies down, scavenge supplies, and mutate to adapt to the ever-increasing monstrosities that you will encounter.

name: Roll A Blade
description: Dice-Building Roguelike with turn-based combat and customize-able dice.

name: FlowerField
description: Tend and cultivate your personal little garden while you are actually working on other things. Choose for yourself in which screen areas you want to play and and watch your plants grow.

name: Shhh!Saw
description: If you scream, it's game over! A death game linked with a microphone. Can you escape from the closed haunted house?

name: Multi Game Party
description: Multi Game party is FIRST AN INDEPENDENT GAME, with cartoon graphics online and solo with a huge catalog of various mini games

name: Celtic Warfare
description: Celtic Warfare is an unique deckbuilder where you take up your weapons and fight the magically enchanted board. Through proper countering and combo's you defeat enemies and raid land, defeat it's king and reap all the rewards, improve you cards further take on harder raids.

name: Project Surfing
description: Ride the waves of speed and time! Master the art of smooth motion to stay fast and climb global leaderboards. Challenge your friends and conquer the old mighty triangles!

name: Fluida
description: Fluida is a simulation logic game where you must complete all of 15 official stages using many types of items like Pipes, Pressure Valves, Pressure Gauges and many more! You can also create and upload your own stages to steam workshop.

name: Elhkia
description: Elhkia is an LLM-powered political sim where you write down your own campaign promises.

name: Rogue Resonance
description: Hack and slash through hordes of enemies and formidable bosses. Enhance your abilities with each skill pickup, augmenting your dash, melee combos, and powerful spells as you grow stronger. Uncover the mysteries of this captivating 3D top-down action-packed roguelike adventure.

name: Rust Song
description: Explore this unique sci-fi style metroidvania-like adventure world. You can acquire a variety of abilities to explore the world and assemble powerful chip combinations. You'll also have the ability to go back in time to change the map's structure and unlock shortcuts.

name: AstroMart Adventures
description: Build a convenience store on an abandoned asteroid. Catch critters and other goods to sell or make them into a slushy.

name: Heart Beat Clue
description: "Heart Beat Clue" merges detective puzzles with romantic storylines. Players' choices affect both mysteries and relationships, offering a unique, interactive experience where love and investigation intersect.

name: Skyland
description: In this gorgeous FTL-inspired tactical RTS, you and your crew must take command of a flying castle, and defend it from sky pirates while fighting enemies of increasing difficulty. Originally developed for Gameboy Advance, now available on Steam!

name: Battle Scars Eternal Stars
description: This is a simulation game, made by an independent game developer, individual developers have limited energy, please don't have too high expectations. You play as a robot exploring a planet. You can freely drive vehicles, use weapons to attack, and more advanced weapons such as controllable missiles

name: Dream Sports Platform
description: Embark on an extraordinary football journey with Dream Sports Platform - an immersive open-world action RPG that goes beyond the football simulator. Progress through levels, shape your character, and unlock rewards that bridge the gap between virtual triumphs and real-world football services.

name: M.A.C.E. Tower Defense 2
description: M.A.C.E. Tower Defense 2, a classic tower defense game with unique towers and enemies

name: Dangerous World
description: "Dangerous World" is an interactive narrative adventure game where players navigate life's complexities as an ordinary girl, making choices that shape the destiny. Engage in emotional interactions, confront tough decisions, witness the consequences of your actions in this journey of self-discovery.

name: BuzzLabs
description: BuzzLabs is a competitive multiplayer aviation shooter with the cutest and buzziest drones ever! Pick your favorite insect or configure a little mutant from dozens of parts.

name: Exiled Into Darkness
description: 1973. A world full of mysteries and horrors. Accepting a new job, you find yourself in abandoned houses, frozen in time and filled with ghosts of the past. Your guide is the mysterious notes left in these houses, which indicate what you are to do next.

name: Jungle Catz
description: Slice, Slash, Dragon Blast, all hostiles and seal time altering zones!

name: Greenfeet Haven
description: Greenfeet Haven is a colony sim set in a fantasy world where you start from nothing into the wild. Cultivate the land, collect resources, craft valuable items and discover new technologies. Organize your village according to your desires, then watch your inhabitants lead their daily lives!

name: I Know This Place..?: Chapter II
description: Chapter II of an extremely unusual project with game and short film chapters. Players influence the plot of the chapters and can leave their real-life items in the chapters. Ultra-deep meaning, nostalgic references, vibe mysticism.

name: Diorama Maker
description: Diorama Maker is an easy to use sandbox toy that lets you build dioramas in both VR and desktop. Choose from thousands of objects and create your own world.

name: Hexplorando
description: Discover the landscape and cultural heritage of Spain in this cozy 3D puzzle game where each region is a puzzle that brings art, territory, and history to life. Unlock heritage elements you can use in a limitless creative sandbox mode, with procedural quests to help you unleash your creativity.

name: Orion Everton: Mysteries of Metrosomia
description: Prove that you are a smart detective. Determine the course of the story with interactive dialogues. Bring together the pieces of the case with a detective board based on multiple choices and decision-making. Solve the mystery behind the evidence you find. Interrogate people. Close the case.

name: Andy Blast vs. The Forces of Evil
description: They wrecked your truck. They took your girl. They ruined date night. It's time for payback! Blast your way through 9 levels of platforming action with your trusty shotgun as you push through hordes of enemies to rescue Jeanette from the clutches of the Forces of Evil!

name: RogueLive
description: Choose your heroes, watch them explore dungeons, and complete missions. In Roguelive, each hero has a unique personality that you need to consider when sending them on missions. Form a party with the warriors that suit your liking, watch how they explore the dungeons, and create your very own party.

name: Fading Skies
description: Explore a vivid fantasy world full of mystery, memorable characters, and heartfelt narrative. Unlock the powerful abilities of Ryn and her dragon companion, as you join her quest to stop the planet’s collapse. Only by confronting the shadows of her forgotten past can the future be saved.

name: Mops & Mobs: A Sweeping Dungeon Novel
description: As the dungeon's janitor, you take care of our monsters' well-being, pick up adventurers' left-over limbs, decorate the dungeon and find ways to let our beloved Dungeon Master look more competent.

name: Mozarella Hills
description: Embark on a Sisyphean adventure in Mozarella Hills, a retro-style 2D platformer rich in Greek mythology. Navigate through pixelated landscapes, solve ancient puzzles, and defy the whims of gods in a quest that blends classic arcade gameplay with a touch of epic storytelling.

name: Cult&Card
description: Card-based survival RTS. Mash cards together, build your cult, craft weapons, recruit followers and discover new rituals. Survive hordes of uncarded heretics and metaprogression.

name: Hazard Pay
description: In this dark and mysterious block-pushing puzzler, you'll navigate through a secret, hazardous laboratory complex. Discover creative methods to destroy evidence and cover up the crimes of your employer.

name: Paradigm Overhaul
description: An action puzzle game that makes full use of the power to break things and the power to heal. Explore a facility filled with dangers, try to escape from the facility, and solve the mysteries of the world.

name: The Girl's Moving Castle
description: he Girl's Moving Castle is an RPG focusing on companion collection and growth, strategic battles, and idle progression, with light interactions. It offers a no-grind, no-pay experience, with daily free rewards, ensuring an easy, premium game experience without spending.

name: Placeless
description: Another place. Another drug epidemic. Another nightmare. Wake up in a drug-ridden slum and fight your way out, building by building. Old school Half Life meets Resident Evil 4 in this procedurally generated survival horror.

name: Re:Aegis
description: Re:AEGIS is a sci-fi roguelite survivors FPS where you take control of a combat android, generate powerful builds, and battle against the hordes of hostile tech in a combat simulation. Will you survive to see the end of the simulation?

name: Deception of Doppelgangers
description: "Deception of Doppelgangers" is an intense 3-player cooperative dungeon crawler game. Explore the dungeon infested with doppelgangers, join forces with other adventurers, and escape the dungeon.

name: Over The Top: WWI
description: Over The Top: WWI brings brutal real-time third-person and first-person combat set in the First World War. Arm yourself with a diverse arsenal, including rifles, artillery, and even tanks, as you navigate the mud-soaked battlefields of the Great War.

name: Skid Island: Asphalt Mayhem
description: Drift, jump and be fast, make cash and tune your cars! Upgrade your ride for smoother drifts and challenge other players.

name: Coin Jar
description: A physics-based incremental game where you drop coins into a jar and buy upgrades to get more coins, a bigger jar, and even unlock auto coin dropping while you idle. Coin fall down, number go up!

name: Kowloon Story 2
description: Kowloon Story 2 | 九龙诡录2 is a horror-themed first-person adventure game in Hong Kong, China. It tells the bizarre story of a beautiful single college girl working late at night in a barbecued pork restaurant......

name: Grog 'n Glory
description: Avast, ye scallywags! Dive headfirst into the rollicking world of "Grog 'n Glory," which thrusts you into the heart of the high seas as a cunning captain. Manage your crew, customize your ship, and navigate the treacherous waters as you plunder and raid your way to infamy. Live the pirate's life.

name: Ctrl.Alt.Deal
description: With your superior intelligence and sneakiness, you can find a way to escape from this heartless megacorp! (As long as no one realizes you’re actually a self-aware AI...) Spy on humans, offer them deals, and negotiate your way to freedom in a turn-based strategy game of corporate dysfunction.

name: Autofahrt
description: A storm is gathering and devouring everything. Drive for your life alone or with friends and escape the deadly storm. Repair and keep your vehicle intact, it's the only way to reach the bunker and survive.

name: Nooch Farm
description: Nooch Farm is a relaxing/colourful Puzzle game with a fun choice based story! Organise the food on the farm into rows, use your smarts to figure out the combinations! Talk to the animals, get to know their hopes and dreams and discover the motivations behind the residents in Nooch Farm!

name: Interstellar Distress
description: A 4 player co-op horror where you answer distress calls and board spaceships in search of survivors.

name: Ravva and the Netherworld Train
description: Embark on the Netherworld Train with Ravva! Behold a new power to fuse with each of their companions, and explore the dangers of the land of the dead! A cute pixel-art platformer adventure awaits you!

name: Bots & Mods
description: Bots & Mods is a workshop sim game. Craft robot components. Design and assemble robots to assist you or put them up for sale. Be ready for market fluctuations and manage your relationship with the gangs.

name: Ilavath: Battle Arenas
description: ILAVATH, is a Team Based Strategy game that draws inspiration ancient legends of India. The war for Amruth (Elixir of Immortaility) has disturbed the cosmic balance. To restore balance, the tri-gods created Ilavath, a realm where heroes from all races battle for Moksha.

name: Mecha Mayhem
description: Tear your enemies limb from limb and protect your faction from the enemy mechs. This rogue-like lets you mix and match body parts to fully customise your brawler for combat. Cause chaos in this physics-based mech fighter! Build & share your own levels in our forge mode!

name: No.996 Magic Tower
description: This game is a strategy RPG with the theme of anti-work from 9 am to 9 pm, six days a week. The gameplay inherits from the classic "Magic Tower" series, combining elements such as pigeons and BD combinations. Please play with caution under the age of 35 to avoid dissing and hurting the boss!

name: Hack Deep
description: A multiplayer cooperative sci-fi 3D action-adventure game. Dive into the depths of the maze with multiple players and bring back treasures.

name: Jump Pals
description: Jump Pals is an endless high-score-chasing platformer about rapidly switching characters to collect as many coins as possible. Use each of the 8 characters' special abilities to jump gaps, stomp monsters, and smash platforms until you can beat all levels in a single attempt.

name: Hollow Earth
description: A horror game where you attempt to rescue a team of lost cavers.

name: Morpi Card Mix
description: BUILD your deck, SUMMON morpis, PLAY cards to UPGRADE your morpis and FIGHT against evil forces. Think and act fast in this real-time roguelike deck-builder game!

name: Red Memory
description: Honoring history and preserving the spirit of heroes, "Red Memories" invites you to immerse yourself in this historical journey. Get ready to delve into this chapter of "Red Memories" and feel the historic moments of struggle for peace.

name: Elfenberg
description: Step into the realm of elves in this magical city-builder-meets-deck-builder mix. Instantly place buildings with cards, choose wisely, and maintain a delicate balance of resources, city development, and harmony with nature in your surroundings.

name: Dice Life: Dice Game
description: A town-building game involving dice rolls that Jelly Button developed but never fully released before Playtika shut down their studio.

name: Puzzle Garage
description: Online puzzles is a logic game for adults and children that can be played on a computer, tablet or smartphone. Multiplayer Puzzles is an online version of the game for several players.

name: Untitled Dungeons & Dragons Game
description: A game by Gameloft in developement for PC and consoles.

name: Bee Welcome!
description: Bee Welcome! is the name of this Hidden Object game AND the name of your bee hotel. Only the most adorable bees will be your guests. Find them among dozens of others!

name: Space Crafter
description: Go on an adventure in the footsteps of an ancient civilisation. Explore hostile planets, build your base and acquire the technologies of the past before they are turned to create chaos.

name: Insane
description: First person shoot，exploration games, as well as more multiplayer modes (currently in development). In this game, as an employee, you discover an abnormal phenomenon in your area. You wake up in the workplace, prepare your equipment, and to explore

name: Incoherence
description: What started as a relaxing day off with your partner suddenly takes a turn when you find yourself waking up alone at the metro station of a creepy, abandoned complex owned by a mysterious megacorporation...

name: Punchline
description: Punchline is an RPG and card management game where you live the life of a fighter. Strengthen your character through training, and as you control their life, engage in battles using cards to defeat your opponents.

name: Neon Net
description: Dive into the neon-lit virtual world as a hacker detective fighting rebellious AI programs, inspired by the "Tron" movie. Unleash hacking skills in a 'Minesweeper'-style game with RPG elements, save the virtual world from chaos while questioning who you are - human or another AI?

name: Breachers VR
description: Breachers VR is an immersive virtual reality (VR) experience that plunges players into intense, action-packed scenarios where they take on the role of elite operatives known as "Breachers." Set in a futuristic world, players must use their tactical skills and quick reflexes to breach, infiltrate, and neutralize various targets. With stunning graphics and intuitive controls, Breachers VR offers an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience that transports players into the heart of covert operations like never before.

name: Maritime Mecha Mystery
description: A dinner party attended by Germanic gods takes a dark turn when the host gets attacked. Can you uncover the truth and catch the assailant?

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last Faith: The Nycrux Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Deus Proxy
description: Deus Proxy is a roguelike that brings together the most exciting aspects of new-school auto battlers and old-school tabletop gaming. Every game is a completely new adventure with 15 factions, human opponents, and hundreds of heroes, items, traits, and spells!

name: Extirpate
description: Extirpate is an open-world survival where one will face a fight against hungry zombies and relentless survivors. Armed with a range of weapons, from silent handguns to explosives, your skills will be tested as you scavenge for resources. Will you survive or become another victim?

name: Outbreak Zombie Plague
description: sarah is a 21 year old university student who's kidnaped on her way home. and wakes up inside a secret facility is a research facility that studies deadly bacteria and viruses. searching for a vaccine to repair dead cells and cell regeneration.

name: No Gasoline
description: A Co-Op/Solo, Adventure-Simulation-Puzzle game. Build your vehicle to overcome the obstacles it will encounter along the way. Find new parts by solving puzzles. Take care of your vehicle. Don't run out of fuel. Explore unique places and stories through the journey.

name: Camera Lens
description: This is a maze game with simple graphics but equally rich content.

name: Book Smugglers
description: Join the courageous underground network of Book Smugglers in a grim decision-making, point-and-click, resource-management adventure as they risk everything to preserve their cultural heritage and ignite a flame of resistance.

name: Punch The Undead
description: The undead are attacking! With your fists of justice are you tough enough to beat them back to the grave?

name: Creatures After Calamity
description: Creatures After Calamity is an unsettling monster battler in which your animals remember how you treat them. Build a team and outsmart your opponents before your creatures turn on you.

name: Gentoo Rescue
description: A puzzler about sliding penguins and walruses. Pickup items to push, pull, bounce, swap, stop, steal, or explode. Solve tightly-designed challenges in a world of puzzles inside puzzles inside puzzles.

name: Haunt or Heist
description: Steal or be damned, the dirty work of the end of the month begins. Up to 4-player cooperative horror heist stealth action. Grab the money and stuff, and don't let them trick.

name: Dodge This
description: Gear up for a cinematic 3rd person multiplayer shooter that'll blow your mind. Dual-wield those bad boys and slip into your shootdodging-pants – it's time to unleash explosive slow-motion mayhem!

name: Billo-Bricks
description: Save the World by destroying Bricks!

name: Demonic Deckmaster
description: Become a new commander in the army of Hell. Ascend the dungeon, craft your deck, and prove your worth to the King of Demons in this roguelike deck building game.

name: Sixth Force
description: A family-friendly action adventure for two players full of humor and heartfelt insights. Play together as a father and son trapped by hallucinating AI in secret neural network. Explore all ever-existing types of co-op and discover emerging combos! May the Sixth Force be with you!

name: Cuplex
description: ----At the end of pursuit, your body becomes the history. "CUPLEX" is a time-shift action puzzle game where you cooperate with "your past self" to reach the goal. Utilize various gimmicks to conquer stages and unveil the truth behind CUPLEX.

name: Chaos Front
description: A turn-based space mecha mercenary game. You can recruit pilots and captains with varying stories and skills, buy and modify spaceships, mecha, artillery, and fighters, take missions, participate in battles between Galactic Powers, change the situations, and experience different stories.

name: Soccer Squad
description: Be the best and bring your football team to the first division. Combine team management with 3d action.

name: Last Viking: Ragnarok Loop
description: RPG with cats, battles, merge, deckbuilding and humor! Inspired by Loop Hero.

name: Monkey Do
description: Monkey Do! is an action-packed adventure game where you control a mischievous monkey, trying to escape a zoo by all means necessary. On his way out, he will encounter many challenges but also meet cheerful characters to help him in his quest for freedom and fun. Are you ready to monkey?

name: Cog Fire
description: Unleash magic mayhem in Cogfire! Craft custom spells and blast through hordes of robots in this 3rd-person roguelike.

name: Great Powers
description: A 4x global turn-based strategy game with a well-developed economic and military model.

name: Cubelets
description: This adventure supports 2 - 4+ players! Play through 5 unique worlds filled with challenges and puzzles with your friends!

name: King Kong City Destroyer
description: Your mission is clear: fulfill King Kong's relentless desires as he wreaks havoc upon everything in his path.

name: Miner Clicker
description: Casual idle mining game: Click to extract minerals, buy and sell based on fluctuating prices, and invest in auto miners to expand.

name: Sojourn Past
description: Embark on a transformative journey, where immersive visuals and stirring music breathe life into a captivating story. Traverse handcrafted landscapes, overcome intricate challenges, and unveil secrets in a one-of-a-kind adventure. Experience a deeply personal experience of self-discovery and growth.

name: Ironheart: Cardia
description: Sin descripción

name: Among The Whispers: Provocation
description: I made this immersive first-person single player ghost investigation experience. Use essential paranormal tools to investigate ghosts. Learn their stories. Release them to the afterlife.

name: Pinnacle Point
description: A short, narrative-driven, 3rd person exploration game set in an 80's tech-noir atmosphere. You will attempt to uncover the mystery of a corporate research facility tasked with extending life through their own vision of a "digital" existence.

name: Another Try 2
description: The virus has devastated cities and lands. Most of the population died, the rest turned into the walking dead. You're one of the last survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another day.

name: A Maze-ing Runner
description: A running game where you navigate a tower of dark mazes to unveil the grand secret of the T.E.O.

name: Forg Feast Frenzy
description: Cook and serve delicious meals for your furry and slimy friends. Play through various single player challenges, or activate the Streamer mode to get cooking with your audience!

name: Mother May I
description: Unravel the story of three siblings determined to break free from the iron grip of an AI named "Mother." In a world of virtual imprisonment, navigate rebellion, unveil dark secrets, and fight for freedom. Will you defy Mother's control, or succumb to her virtual prison?

name: Dreamers Disease
description: An atmospheric FPS where you can shoot yourself to fight against the Dreamers Disease. Go deeper and deeper into your dreams to kill the seed of the disease to save other people from getting infected. The game is inspired by modern boomer shooters with a story focused narrative.

name: Jeweler Simulator
description: Jeweler Simulator: Become the King of Precious Stones! Equip your store with the most dazzling diamonds and put them up for sale to acquire even better ones. Rise in the leaderboard with the prestige you'll gain and become one of the world's top jewelers

name: Witherbloom
description: The Gods provided everything - now they are gone. With one of 16 multi-class combos, plunder divine realms for resources, allies, and answers. Overcome twisted aberrations and surreal environments with 1-4 players in exciting survival-ARPG gameplay. Rebuild a shattered world... if you can survive.

name: Outward 2
description: Outward 2 is a challenging action RPG with survival elements focusing on a believable and relatable experience. There is no hand holding, no leveled encounters, no divine gift making you tower over your enemies. Eat your meal, check your map, grab your backpack: a fulfilling adventure awaits.

name: Lost in Prayer
description: Lost in Prayer is a traditional grid-based roguelike in which everything that kills you becomes playable. As a disembodied soul, possess the inhabitants of the afterlife to conquer either Heaven or Hell as you seek the final deliverance you were promised.

name: Hangry
description: Explore the galaxy. Discover new life. EAT IT. Play as Hangry, a beastly mercenary with an insatiable hunger hunting down fearsome monsters in this snack n' slash RPG. Traverse mouthwatering hunting grounds to find ingredients for Goutra, the chief chef of an underworld diner in an alien city.

name: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising
description: Battle for Ercaton: Robot Uprising is a first-person shooter where the player takes on the role of an earthling who crashed a spaceship and ended up on the planet Ercaton, which is inhabited by dangerous robots.

name: Bobo Blitz
description: A fast-paced deckbuilder football game. Craft your strategy, manage energy, and score big. Lead your team to glory in this unique sports clash!

name: Raver Simulator
description: Find a place for yourself in the magical world of rave music. Try to achieve your goal of becoming the best raver by fighting the symptoms of addiction.

name: HiddenLight
description: "HiddenLight" is a game about the adventures of two teenagers - a boy named Saul and a girl named Celine - in a world plunged into darkness and teeming with demons

name: My Hidden Pets: Find My Duck
description: Step into the unique world of duck searching. Bring a friend and see how many ducks you can find in the latest adventure of the My Hidden Pets series

name: Final Eden
description: This is a side scrolling aerial shooting game where players need to operate the last human survivor, Lilith, to move and shoot in the air, use constantly improving weapons to eliminate enemies, complete all levels, and ultimately find her own value in the shattered world.

name: Cosmic Castaways
description: Cosmic Castaways is a roguelite survival game. You recruit alien characters to form a group of survivors, and implement survival and combat strategies. You will need to manage conflicts that arise from various values, and this will emphasize challenging and complex aspects of the game.

name: Distant Past
description: 50,000 Years ago a once thriving and industrious earth was invaded by monsters and all manner of evil. Can you stop them before they send the world back to the stone age?

name: Clean Corps
description: Clean Corps is a first person shooter that sees you take the role of a trash collecting superhero created by a child to inspire others to help clean his local beach! Use your vacuum arm to shoot enemies and suck up garbage to clear each level as fast as you can and take out the trash!

name: Overpixel
description: Overpixel is a great game where you can have a fun time. You will get great pleasure on your own. Overpixel is a 2d-dimensional adventure game.

name: Mildred's Tarot Battle
description: A Cozy, Fun, Turn-Based, Card-Battler! Mildred's proving to her daughter that she’s not ready for the Old Folks Home. Join her in different adventures as she battles her way to independence with the help of her Super-Cute Tarot Deck!

name: Hnefatafl Online
description: Reviving an Ancient Board Game Cherished by Vikings a Millennium Ago - Now Available for Local and Real-Time Online Multi-Platform Competition! Dive into a Game of Deep Strategy and Online Battles.

name: Bridge Maker
description: Each level presents a fresh puzzle, testing your creativity and engineering acumen.

name: Hopeless Sea
description: Hopeless Sea is a vertical arcade shooter roguelike where you pilot a ship to escape hordes of random frenzied sea monsters. Arm yourself with a variety of gears and traits as you navigate through the madness and uncover the mysteries lurking beneath the waves.

name: Eternal Puppet
description: Immerse yourself in a world of psychological horror in ETERNAL PUPPET! Complete the pending tasks and survive the paranormal events in an immersive warehouse. But be careful, you are not alone in the warehouse. Get ready to face your worst fears!

name: Phantom Squad
description: As a team of 2-4 players, communicate, plan, execute and improvise to succeed in this online coop, fast-paced, brutal top-down shooter where tactics are as crucial as skill.

name: Legacy of Animal: Hog's Life 2
description: life as an wild animal

name: Killdozer Simulator
description: In KILLDOZER SIMULATOR, operate an armored bulldozer in a top-down action-packed struggle to demolish the town and clash with The Powers That Be. Upgrade your vehicle and weapons, plot your path of destruction, and become a legendary folk hero.

name: Buckshot Better Together
description: Russian roulette on multiplayer with 2-4 players, new card ability system allowing for unique strategy and gameplay. Take a seat at the table.

name: BlueSkies 3
description: BlueSkies 3 is a 2D fantasy turn-based JRPG featuring a magical world full of wonders. Journey with the young oracle named Candace Aethelmey and her friends, as they venture forth to join the Arcane Mastery Tournament. Along the way, they find new friends and unravel magical mysteries.

name: Horizon's Edge
