description: Horizon's Edge is an exciting survival game set in a mysterious world. Players must brave the elements, scavenge for food, and build shelters while collaborating with others and battling rival tribes. Dynamic weather and unexpected events make for an intense experience.

name: Drops of God: Creating your Ambrosia
description: Join Blue and Goutte in the marvelous world of Drops of God, where the art of winemaking is elevated to a symphony of flavors and emotions while you Create your Ambrosia, the wine of God.

name: Myoka: First Person View
description: Myoka is a Open World first person view simulator. Fly quadcopters, drive cars, motorcycles, bikes, and more! New updates, 4x a year, will include brand new spaces and vehicles to control.

name: Dissecting Love
description: An autopsy of a queer relationship.

name: CubeGod
description: In this city builder, build a city and defeat invading bugs, but don't squish your own civilians.

name: For Those We Forgot
description: In this first person psychological horror game your concept of what is real will be questioned over and over again while you venture in this old apparently abandoned apartment. Be careful at every corner and every shadow, things may not be what they seem.

name: Decktamer
description: Deck-building meets monster catching in this turn-based roguelike. Recruit enemy cards to your party as you dive into the depths of the abyss. Will you kill them or will you tame them?

name: End Of World: Story
description: The AI was defeated 499 years ago. Four civilizations coexist in the galaxy. As the 500th anniversary of the Quantum Event approaches, a mysterious anomaly appears. Ancient secrets, long buried, begin to surface. What lies beyond this veil of cosmic mystery? - Heists, Space Farming, Sci-Fi RPG

name: Gwiryungdan: Joseon's Twelve
description: Embark on a journey as [Maru], a young man earning a living by impersonating a revered member of [Gwiryungdan], a renowned military organization dedicated to tracking down mysterious creatures across the land of the Joseon dynasty.

name: The Schism
description: The Schism is an online co-op horror game. There has been a paranormal split, colliding realities and causing all manner of dangerous lifeforms to scatter across the globe. With the world in chaos, it seems like it's down to you and your team of scientists to get to the bottom of it.

name: NutShot
description: NutShot is a hilarious, stylized, fast-paced, movement-based, high-stakes, FPS arena shooter that's all about moving fast. Speed through arenas by jumping, diving, sliding, grappling, and more. Let the best peanut win!

name: Anima Keeper
description: Time is always running out in Anima Keeper. Your main goal is to survive before the collapse comes. Marauders, mystical creatures, mutated monsters with deformed souls - they all want you dead. Do whatever it takes to gather treasures and hide in a shelter before the final wave of collapse.

name: Naru-Morph!
description: Naru-Morph! is a 2D action platformer featuring a morphing gimmick.Utilize various abilities unique to each morph to explore the world, defeat fierce enemies, and to reach the Heavens!

name: Conviction: The Glory Of Kraft
description: This is a turn-based tactical game where you will lead the protagonist and his mercenaries to repel enemies through tactics. Soldiers are not merely consumables, you can achieve the greatest victory by making good use of troop countering.

name: Starbridge: The Voyage Home
description: Star Bridge: A Voyage Home is an immersive co-op multiplayer adventure. Stranded on the far reaches of the universe, explore alien worlds, upgrade and repair your ship, investigate space anomalies, engage in trade and combat encounters with extraterrestrial beings on your journey back to Earth.

name: Vanguard
description: Vanguard is a thrilling multiplayer party game that blends arcade-style visuals and gameplay with a diverse array of competitive modes. Perfect for gamers of all skill levels, it offers fast-paced action, strategic depth, and whimsical fun for an inclusive and dynamic gaming experience.

name: King of The Jesters
description: After another fit, the lead singer of a punk rock band finds himself in the world of his fantasies. Here he is greeted by strange creatures, horrifying monsters, and bloody stories. Will the main character be able to return to his world or will he remain here forever?

name: Reinforced Machine
description: Reinforced Machine is a twin-stick shooter action game. Choose your favorite mech, each with their own unique skills. Unleash powerful attacks with the help of your AI-assisted weapons to aid you in your battle against legions of cyborg creatures.

name: Auto Sale Life: Fresh Start
description: Build an automotive empire. Buy, sell, and customize cars to create your own brands and showrooms. Become a shrewd entrepreneur in this immersive car trading and customization game.

name: Tunnels of Terror
description: As a sewer maintenance worker, your mission is to explore, solve puzzles and battle your way through a treacherous sewer network and uncover clues about fellow co-workers that have mysteriously vanished in the depths.

name: FPS Pro Team Manager
description: Recruit and manage the team of FPS players of your dreams, create your own strategies and rise to the top of the world's elite.

name: Kitchen Carnage
description: Kitchen Carnage: Dive into the chaotic world of restaurant ownership! Manage your eatery amidst demanding customers. With ever-changing environments and menus, adapt and thrive in this dynamic culinary adventure!

name: Seekers of Skyveil
description: MOBA + EXTRACTION. Team-based PvPvE with top-down combat, where players battle for powerful loot against rivals. Gear up, make a plan, and set a course for Skyveil. Stealthy treasure runs explode into multi-team PvP chaos in an instant. Extract with your riches—or lose it all.

name: Annihilated
description: Choose one of your brave party and take on the dark labyrinth of death. You choose who to save.

name: Museum Keeper
description: Build your dream museum and go digging for lost treasures! Manage staff, theme your exhibits, buy and sell artifacts, and fight creatures that try to disrupt your research! Watch out for thieves, and loud teenagers, and ofcourse, use your museum to turn around the fortunes of your local town!

name: CSCĐ: Vietnam Mobile Police
description: A tactical shooter game about Vietnam's Mobile Police Force - CSCĐ.

name: Orkendale: The Scarred Land
description: Orkendale: The Scarred Land is an open-world role-playing game in which the fate of an entire continent is in your hands. Whether the orcs will be able to take over the continent or humanity will defeat them will depend only on your decisions...

name: Heavy Storm Shadow
description: This is a very fast God's perspective roguelike shooter, the player will pilot the mech, explore the alien frontier, enjoy the "Crimsonland + Vampire Survivors (Vampire Survivors)" endless killing!

name: Ancestral Players
description: Ancestral Players combines the tension of battle royale with the action of arena shooters. Players have multiple lives and level up after each death.

name: Magic Monster Slasher
description: Enter the battlefield of "Magic Monster Slasher", an intense round-based combat game that tests your strategic skills and quick decisions. Choose your abilities, arm yourself, and prepare to face waves of relentless enemies with only one goal: to defeat you.

name: Sina
description: Made by Triunfo Game Studios, Sina is an action-adventure game with soulslike elements. With a great focus on its story, scenario development, and fluid combat, this game provides a memorable experience for anyone who dares to challenge their fate.

name: Bots 4 Defense
description: Unite in a 1-4 player strategy game fusing tower defense with the thrill of controlling powerful BOTS. Deploy defenses, tweak tower loadout and tech tree. Amp up the party mode with friends. Attack, defend, build – your strategy, your call!

name: Maze and Fairy tale
description: This is a 2D style, survival and tower defense built ARPG game. Combine dungeon and tower defense construction, become a trap master, and punch unexpected Combo. The more days you survive, you will have the opportunity to travel through a complete fairy tale world.

name: Dice Dice Dice: A Roll Playing Game
description: Roll the dice and explore a dicey world were all your actions and out comes are decided by the roll of a dice. Build up your team customize your dices and roll play your way through combat.

name: Spookville: Cabin Escape
description: Prepare to be gripped by a tale of dark magic and supernatural powers as you unravel the chilling mystery that surrounds the cabin. Spookville: Cabin Escape transports players into a world where danger lurks around every corner, and courage is their only lifeline.

name: Endless Mansion
description: Endless Mansion is a first-person horror game with a procedural-generated mansion full of secrets. Explore the ever-changing mansion, collect items, solve puzzles, and find a way to avoid hostile entities. There are no checkpoints. Explore, collect, hide, die, learn your lesson, repeat.

name: Phear
description: Phear is a psychological horror game tailored for up to 4 players in online co-op. Tasked with investigating perilous locations, you and your team must find clues about the haunting entity, navigating the chilling and atmospheric locales together.

name: Townland
description: Townland is a procedurally generated tile based deck building game about making islands vegetate and make them looking cool.

name: 5 Bucks for the Bus
description: THE WORKING CLASS RPG. In this rpg you can only pick one class, the working class. Play as Paintricia, she used to paint art, then she painted walls, now she's stuck with no cash for the bus ride home. Wandering the giant liminal space that is "The City" things start to get weird.

name: Sector Unknown
description: Sector Unknown is a story-rich, isometric RPG set in a shadowy expanse of space. Begin on a desolate planet, establish a stronghold, explore space, ally with or dominate local factions, and ignite a rebellion against a despotic organization bent on exploiting the sector's resources and inhabitants.

name: Top Percent
description: Top Percent is a Competitive Party Royale game that combines the excitement of battle royale with the joy of party games, offering players a thrilling and entertaining experience with diverse challenges and strategic gameplay. Join the fun, beat your foes and rise to the top in "Top Percent" today!

name: The Tale of Destiny Island
description: Find your path at this forsaken island. Become a Member of a guild and expand your arsenal to overcome your next obstacle. Stück für Stück wirst du so die Wahrheit erkennen, die hinter dem Vorhang liegt. Piece by piece you will unravel the truth which lies behind the curtain.

name: Dustmen
description: Dustmen is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game. Set in plague times, the King has commanded you to sanitize and remove clutter from abandoned places to prevent the plague from spreading. Yet, be careful and keep an eye out for creatures around you.

name: Cat and Mouse
description: "Cat and Mouse" is roguelike game which contain backpackage manage and auto-chess element.Player can expand the backpackage to place more stone,summon stronger army.Upgrade the hero and learn more skill.Defead the mouse army.

name: Layers Deep
description: Little Onion in big southern forest. Lost. Little Onion scared, use sickle to smack mean things. Onion man find upgrade, upgrade powerful and shiny! Onion get stronger, fights bigger things, explores more of forest. Little Onion on epic quest. Go Onion goooo!

name: LuoYang
description: "LuoYang" is a UE5 single-player action game set in the Wu Zhou period of the Tang Dynasty. Players play the role of an agent of the "Heaven's Will Bureau", eliminating cult crises, exorcising demons, and maintaining the story of the peace of the capital Luoyang.

name: Nuclear Playground
description: Nuclear Playground is a survival-horror game set in Chernobyl. Clean up radioactive items while evading mutated horrors. Manage resources and survive the deadly environment. Theme: environmental disaster.

name: Cyber Volley
description: A 2D Side Scroller like you never seen before! Cute characters and locations await you in this unique game. Bump the volleyball around to reach the goal. The character has precise controls, while the ball is physics-based.

name: Sunday Run
description: Sunday Run is a single-player speedrunning platformer with a chill vibe and global leaderboards.

name: Phantom Whispers
description: In Phantom Whispers, players embark on a journey into darkness, where reality blends with nightmares, and the line between sanity and madness fades away. Each episode delves deeper into the psyche of the protagonist as they confront their deepest fears and darkest secrets.

name: Mall Manager
description: Welcome to Mall Manager, where you can build and manage your personalized mall. Choose your manager, design from scratch, and expand across unique worlds. A friendly indie management sim.

name: All the Mods 9: No Frills
description: ATM9 has over 400 mods and countless quests and a built in proper endgame. No Frills has way less mods but the same endgame.

name: Sinner
description: Leave a trail of ashes in this 2D Platformer Roguelike. Set yourself ablaze to go through stages and complete their given objective. But don't get too complacent, you can't stay lit forever. Manage your health carefully, the sinful creatures of the Crucible will not stand idle.

name: Blukaty
description: Discover the story about a made up war that happened in soviet territory in the early '90s. Explore old abandoned cities and many more locations around the exclusion zone. Scavenge for loot and stay safe from the hostiles, they could be human, or not. You can also compete in multiplayer game-modes.

name: Escape from Zeta Aurigae
description: Build your ship, escape the swarm, survive for as long as you can. When you are finally defeated, upgrade your technologies to survive longer next time. Escape from Zeta Aurigae is a sci-fi ship builder with rich meta progression.

name: Battle Bean
description: Battle Bean is a fast-paced 3D action platformer game where you run, jump, swing, and spin your way through levels while taking down the Robo-Clan. Collect Items, defeat enemies, save villagers, and restore your once peaceful town of Beanville!

name: Siphonogore
description: Siphonogore is a Hemothematic Turn-Based Roguelike Dungeon Crawler. The world is meat; calloused and rotten. Within the hollow husk of a sleeping god a war rages for the source of its power. Control a cobbled together creature of obscure origin, a self-made successor, here to take what is yours.

name: FungEye
description: An evil mushroom is spreading its poison throughout the ecosystem. You must discover the secrets to stop it by solving puzzles, interacting with the environment, and getting help from your fungal friends. Turn on, tune in and drop out, because this is gonna be one long, strange trip!

name: Spirulena Interceptor
description: In this casual strategy game, navigate the cosmos using classic space control panels. Align orbits and manage energy in a unique sci-fi setting where every switch and button charts your path

name: European Card Wars
description: Classic strategy drama of the century, you take control of a nation. Rule your country and gain freedom, become the ruler of the world with depth and historical consistency. Rewrite the history of the world and build a magnificent empire.

name: Bullet Speed
description: Bullet speed is a lightning fast paced arena shooter seeing blood fueled robotic avatars cracked on adrenaline shooting each other. Move fast. Kill with style. Repeat.

name: Embers
description: Take a breath. Feel the warmth as you sip your favorite tea. Are you ready? Now, step away from the bustle of your daily life and into the shadows of the deepest forest. Write, reflect, and stare into the embers.

name: Marble Meadows
description: Marble Meadows is a new cozy 3D platformer full of whimsy & wonder. Relax and roll your way around various thematic stages, or try your hand zipping and bouncing through more complex levels in order to complete skill-based challenges!

name: Fool's Frontier
description: Build the last refuge in a dying world. Manage the material and psychological needs of your people. Pass laws to prevent discord. Send frail champions on doomed expeditions. Can you find salvation amidst the myriad horrors of the Fool's Frontier?

name: Lair Of The Leviathan
description: Journey through a large open world with a party of heroes exploring dungeons, villages and mysteries. Manage an adventuring party of heroes and choose the way their stories evolve as they journey through a non linear epic adventure towards the ultimate Lair of the Leviathan.

name: Aviassembly
description: Aviassembly gives you the opportunity to build and fly your own airplane. Transport different types of cargo to make money, improve your designs and discover new destinations.

name: Ofuxë the Guardian of Nature
description: Control Ofuxë's kinetic abilities to free the wild animals from the scientists. Complete missions and progress through various maps and levels.

name: Cogs and Carnage
description: Arm your mech and join your friends on the battlefield, as you send bullets and adversaries flying through the air, in this action packed, fast paced topdown arena shooter. Cogs and Carnage is all about wreaking havoc while having a laugh. Enter the hangar, build your mech and join the fight!

name: CoreVR
description: Welcome to CoreVR, ready to experience something new, something fresh, something to play with friends and make new ones, make content for you, your friends and everyone in CoreVR. Feel free to make content with our unity Core Creation System.

name: Abort
description: Dark shadows linger on the past. The brutal truth is hidden beneath the mask of a seemingly happy family. Dear brother, watch your steps and hold onto my hands. Don't fall into the darkness alone. Be our eyes, be our escape.

name: Zombie Roguelite
description: Post-apocalyptic top-down shooter roguelite where you play as different characters, equip a variety of weapons, load up on unique loadouts and go zombie shooting. You trade your earned experience for fun upgrades. You can purchase some permanent upgrades that help you get better for the next run!

name: Stellar Legacy
description: Create your own furry character! In "Stellar Legacy" you'll meets friends, fight alongside them, and share joyful moments! With a exciting PVE challenges, thrilling PVP battles, and various unique life skills, a boundlessly free and fantastical world awaits you.

name: Stop Rod
description: After being smashed by a pole in the parking lot, we made this game! The personal lesson reminds everyone, be careful of being hit by the stop rod in the parking lot~

name: StimuAction
description: ・Blue troops are allies, red troops are enemies. ・In the hexagonal map, friendly units are thrown against enemy units, and combat ensues. ・The battle is a side view action, shoot, shoot, slash. ・You can win by destroying all the enemy units! ・Use turrets and laser turrets to attack unilaterally!

name: Realmweaver
description: Realmweaver is an Isometric grid-based puzzle game that tests both your puzzle solving and timing skills with a unique set of puzzles and mechanics to master and overcome!

name: Deperson
description: Are you ready to step into a dark and mysterious world with Aaron, who is afraid of his own shadow? A file that has been closed for years is opened again, the forgotten ones wake up from their sleep and the silence is broken by screams.

name: Blood Crossroad
description: Blood Crossroad is a first-person psychological tale about William, a man who must deal with his alcoholism and his deepest shame as he is chased by a mysterious presence from Japanese folklore.

name: Lost Group
description: Lost Group is a 1-5 player Co-op Horror game, Explore abandoned locations with your friends and try to complete tasks to earn your freedom

name: KumaWelt 1: Honey Frontier
description: KumaWelt 1: Honey Frontier is a 2D tower defense game, featuring towers like chess pieces and unique commanders. Build towers in chessboard-like levels to defend the honey depots from nightmare invasion.

name: A Journey's End
description: Inspired by spirited away, a boy that's in the spirit world and he wants to go home.

name: Call from the Abyss
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Dungeon
description: Animal Dungeon is a Rogue-like game with a combination of Hell Bullet. Fight the Lion King as just a Cat, Hedgehog, Dog or Fox

name: Cabral's Quest
description: A puzzle game set in a hidden world. Recover each fragment of the sacred deed to help Cabral the capybara and his community recover their land. Use different runes to change the elements of the world around you to solve each puzzle.

name: Jigsaw Hyottoko Club
description:
Jigsaw Hyottoko Club is an Open-source multiplayer jigsaw puzzle game, which is played in the browser. You can enjoy a relaxing puzzle online with your friends.

There is also the option to upload your own images and puzzle them together. There are various settings, including private games, adjust number of pieces for puzzles, as well as different piece style mode (for example completely flat pieces), different scoring modes and various piece snap modes.

The game can be played as guest or as a logged in user. Logged in users who finish puzzles will show up on the leaderboards.

There is also a feature that allows you to watch replays and create time lapse videos from it.

name: SnakeTris
description: Sin descripción

name: Feudal Wars
description: This game is a mixture of two genres - TOWER DEFENSE and SURVIVAL. You have to get into the times of Feudal Fragmentation and put an end to this era

name: Violent Angel
description: Cancelled game about a teenage hooker coming back to life to kill her dirt bag cop bf.

name: Moonport
description: Moonport is a side-scrolling, real time strategy, space colony simulation with roguelike elements. You play as a brave space explorer who aspires to colonize the moons of Saturn. How many moons can you conquer?

name: Vermin
description: A narrative driven survival horror game with metroidvania elements, set in the wake of a nuclear disaster, you hunt as you struggle to quench the ever growing appetite of the your heart, in hopes of completing "The Cleanse"

name: Surradia: An Art Retrospective
description: Unravel the mystery of three magical artists who went missing during World War II in this challenging, story-rich deduction game. Explore artworks, letters, photographs, and interviews to answer the question: What really happened to the Surradistes?

name: Into The Craft
description: You'll start with nothing. You have to create everything yourself. Immerse yourself in a procedurally generated world, that will offer something different to explore every time! Survive among wild animals, fighting Goblins, Orcs and Undead. Find the magical portal and face what's on the other side!

name: Ghost Girl Lasling: Chibi Stickers
description: Sin descripción

name: Die drei Freunde von der Reitschule
description: Real estate sharks are targeting Laura's uncle's beautifully located riding school. To save the indebted riding school, Uncle Arthur needs a lot of money, which his son Christian wants to win by winning the big horse show. However, a mysterious accident prevents him from doing so.

name: Sex Island
description: Sex Island - is an immersive world of narrative visual novel where intrigue, adventure, and irresistible allure intertwine.

name: Construct&Conquer: The Levant in the 12th Century
description: This work is a comprehensive game that combines elements of management, strategy, and competition. The game is based on the Arab world during the Crusades. It depicts a down-and-out young lord leading his people to rebuild their homes and fight against the enemy in the desert of abject poverty.

name: Spring in Summer
description: A storytelling sandbox adventure driven by your own personality about helping a jackalope ghost who cannot move on. Explore a mystical island inhabited by quirky mythical creatures, connect with the hearts of its community, & discover one’s heart fulfillment in your own heartwarming personal journey

name: Miro
description: Explore vibrant worlds while uncovering the mysteries of your origin. Overcome the dangers that await you in the vast unknown fields of unexplored planets. The truth reveals itself to those who seek, but remember that your destiny depends solely on you.

name: Something is Missing...
description: A generic paint-by-numbers game starring Princess Daisy from the Super Mario Bros. franchise, made for the Play Nintendo promotional website.

name: Facility 079
description: Explore the winding corridors of research Facility 079 in this first-person Horror Adventure game as you guide logistics employee Aiden Pryce through the abandoned bunker's hazardous depths on a search for critical data that holds the key to avert the impending apocalypse.

name: Untitled Zombie Game
description: Joburg city’s population has turned into zombies. To save his mother a taxi driver has teamed up with an unlikely group to save u’mama.

name: Polygunr
description: Sin descripción

name: Horn-Nie
description: This is a game about animal poaching and how the endangered species gain super powers which they use to fight poachers and save their captured animal friends.

name: P.O.O Weekly
description: A game about South African Political Satire and Parody based on real historical events.

name: Punchgolf
description: Play as a golf ball that can jump and be punched to get past obstacles to your goal! with a cast of weird golf balls.

name: X-Men: Character - Magneto
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Jean Grey/Phoenix
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Iceman
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Cyclops
description: Sin descripción

name: Wes Craven's Principles of Fear
description: An unreleased game by Cyberdreams which was meant to release for Halloween in 1997 for the PC, and was based off a concept by horror movie director Wes Craven.

name: Hunters of Ralk
description: An unreleased role playing game designed by the co-creator of "dungeons & dragons", which was meant to be the start of a series featuring 3D combat in a first person perspective and textured mapped graphics.

name: Dirty Harry: Excessive Force
description: An unreleased video game based off the Dirty Harry film franchise by Warner Bros..

name: Orbeats
description: Orbeats is a crank-based rhythm game made for the PlayDate with a light space theme.

name: Cosmo Nash: Culinary Courier
description: Sin descripción

name: Cortex Chronicles 3: The Escape of Rowan Reed
description: Rowan Reed is imprisoned in one of the worst prisons in existence. But not all is lost. Help is outside. Rowan just needs to get there.

name: Zarya
description: Zarya - a narrative simulator of a rural driver in a post-Soviet style. Deliver packages along country roads, assist the villagers, earn money, collect classic cars, and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the homeland.

name: Rockman The Puzzle Battle
description: Rockman The Puzzle Battle (ロックマン ザ パズルバトル, Rokkuman za Pazuru Batoru) is a game released by Capcom on July 1, 2011 for docomo, au and SoftBank branded mobile phones in Japan. The game is currently available for download via Capcom's digital download service, and the i-mode Internet service for docomo brand phones.[1]

name: Eve of Destruction
description: Play as Eve, a creature unaware of their own legend, awakened from your eternal slumber and sent to the Spirit Realm: a world in ruins, dominated by Demons and Knights - will you bring salvation or destruction?

name: No Ticket Back: Craft, Survive & Escape
description: As the brave crew sets course for the Red Planet, their mission takes a terrifying turn. In the vast emptiness of space, their once-proud vessel becomes a haunted nightmare. Can they survive the horrors that await them in the darkness and escape or will they succumb before completing their mission?

name: Give Me Clair Back
description: First/third horror story about Nethan Black, wrongly blamed for the disappearance of his girlfriend Clair, must gather the evidence necessary to prove his innocence while facing out-of-this-world challenges.

name: Nevermind
description: Nevermind - is a visual novel, which takes place in a post-apocalyptic world in Russia. You will have to fight for survival, collecting resources and exploring destroyed cities, but the most important thing is to learn what it means to be human.

name: Solse AI-Quest
description: Solse AI-Quest: an AI-powered RPG where conversations shape the adventure. Navigate a pixel-art world, engage with dynamic characters, and influence the story through choice-driven actions and time skips. A retro-style game re-imagined.

name: Stop! Don’t Die In Australia
description: "STOP! Don’t Die in Australia" Australia is a playground for laughter and cheeky surprises. This game isn’t just a love letter to the land of kangaroos and koalas; it’s a full-on comedy show that has you trekking and chuckling through the quirkiest spots down under.

name: Battler
description: Jump as a samurai ghost into a beautiful hell filled with damned soul. Alone, with or against your friends, fight for your survival with fine-tuned and fast paced top down combat mechanics. Gain enough power and momentum killing foes to fight the ultimate keeper, but don't get hit!

name: High Seas, High Profits!
description: Live your medieval trader life by buying low, selling high and exploring the world in a chill, turn based setting. Buy ships, build businesses, find or train captains, deal with pirates, ambitious mayors and traders & react to hundreds of events that shape your very own procedurally generated world!

name: Dark Sanctum
description: Overcome challenges, plan strategies, and collect cards and resources to progress in a procedural world of turn-based auto-combat. Embark on a strategic journey with an initial deck, face diverse enemies, unlock new decks, and strategically build your arsenal.

name: Legends of Starkadia
description: Legends of Starkadia is a quirky turn-based RPG full of action-packed adventure! The Starkadian Empire is under attack by one of their own and it’s up to a team of unlikely heroes to assist the resistance to restore peace by defeating Niko and his legion of interstellar armies.

name: Jet Skiing Race
description: Prepare to immerse yourself in the ultimate aquatic thrill ride with Jet Skiing Race!

name: No Signal
description: A narrative-driven hidden object game about finding parts, fixing computers, and listening to recorded conversations. Learn the meaning behind the mysterious signals emitted by the black hole. Find your way back home.

name: A Silent Desolation
description: Stranded on Earth centuries after humanity's departure, A Silent Desolation, created by a single developer, immerses you in the mystery of an abandoned world. Craft, explore, and unravel the secrets of a forgotten Earth as you embark on a quest to repair a space shuttle launch base.

name: Lily in DreamWorld
description: An action RPG where the departed miniature dachshund Lily strives to reunite with her owner!!

name: Kitchen Delights
description: Kitchen Delights is an exciting cooking game that will put your culinary skills to the test, where you can be a chef in a restaurant or a burger joint, creating delicious dishes. With a touch of chaos and lots of fun.

name: It Takes a Village
description: It Takes a Village is a city-building RPG taking inspiration from games like Legend of Zelda and Animal Crossing. Venture into a procedurally generated world filled with monsters, dungeons, and more as you collect resources to build up your village to push back the evil that infests your world.

name: Banished Stone
description: A casual fantasy action RPG. Wanted for a number of crimes your bounty has reached a level that can no longer be ignored. Work with the Company to earn your freedom and a one way pass to Paradise. Solve your fathers murder, collect bounties, solve quests, tame pets and learn to use your wings.

name: I.O. Setter
description: The main character, astronaut marauder, a former engineer who managed to find out about the secret station, visits the abandoned I.O. complex in search of valuable technologies for further sale. He is absolutely sure that he is the only living being on the station, and in some ways he is right…

name: Silicon Wasteland
description: SILICON WASTELAND is a visual novel set during the twilight years of humanity, and follows the wandering android Silica, as she explores the beautiful and sometimes frightening wonders of the world, in a ongoing quest to discover her purpose.

name: Echoes of the Ashen
description: An engaging, casual RPG adventure, featuring bite-sized dungeon crawling with turn-based skirmishes, set in a story-rich, lore-filled world.

name: Hop'n & Bop'n
description: Dive into a rhythmic adventure in this dynamic 3D platformer! Navigate over 30 levels filled with challenges that sync with the music. Run, jump, slide, and slam your way through, uncovering secrets and dodging hazards in a uniquely musical experience.

name: Deep Space Drillers
description: Deep Space Drillers is a top-down spaceship game, where you mine and sell valuable ores from asteroids to upgrade your ship and explore the dangerous depths of space in search of the rarest metals and gems.

name: Boo's Burgers
description: Boo's Burgers is a comedic narrative horror game where you work as a nightshift cook and odd jobs in hopes of getting back what you lost.

name: Vivere Memento
description: A city forgotten by everyone, two women trying to unravel its secrets, and a dismal silence of war. Is it possible to create without the hope of being heard? Is it possible to mourn for someone obliterated in memories?

name: Trope Tales
description: A somewhat comical take on classic JRPGs. Take on the role of Hero, a Silent Protagonist, as you venture across the world to defeat the Main Villains with the help of your friends: The Chick, The Smart Guy, and The Childhood Friend.

name: Idle Spiral: Bubble Spiral Pack
description: You will get the Bubble Spiral as a new design!

name: Idle Spiral: Daily Spiral Pack
description: Enhance your Daily Bonus and earn extra Spiral Points!

name: Idle Spiral: Space Pack
description: You will get the Space Spiral as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Snake Pack
description: You will get the Snake-shaped as a new design.

name: Idle Spiral: Arrow Pack
description: You will get the Arrow Spiral as a new design.

name: The Fruit Stealing Girls
description: Princess Verdant and Princess Carmine, sisters, are torn apart when their cherished golden apples vanish. Accusing each other, they send you to spy on the apple tree. Surrounded by the eerie fog that seems to have a life of its own, you must find out who the ghost is.

name: Sperme d’Éros: Garden of Earthly Delights
description: This DLC will expand the universe of the original Visual Novel, Gardens of Earthly Delights. We will follow this story from the point of view of the couple Eros and Venus. We will follow their materialistic and carnal desires as they delight in pleasures in our real world.

name: Garden of Earthly Delights
description: I'm a man with amnesia. However, I see in my dreams a paradise filled with carnal pleasures, pornography, and explicit sex. I need to find this place to recover my lost memory. Melody found me unconscious and naked. She saved my life and I love her. However, I must face my destiny!

name: Inazuma Souls
description: Inazuma Souls is a hackrom of Inazuma Eleven 1 focused on difficulty and being much more challenging than the base games. Besides, it is a hackrom with +1000 players that can be signed, including players from all the sagas and custom players. It also has a postgame with many secrets and a very high difficulty, a unique experience when playing Inazuma Eleven.

name: Space Manifest
description: Explore the realm of space banking, where strategic competition, intricate dynamics, and absolute profits define the landscape.

name: Thorgal
description:
Thorgal is an adventure action game with RPG elements, set in the world of popular comics created by Grzegorz Rosiński and Jean Van Hamme. Based on a classic, well-known tale cherished by fans, the fantasy storyline aims to provide a modern and engaging adaptation.

The player will take on the role of the main character of the series, Thorgal Aegirsson - a Viking warrior with a mysterious origin. He will have to face enemies lurking for him and his family - humans and gods known from Norse mythology. Throughout the gameplay, there are many familiar RPG tasks to complete, and he will also have to confront dangerous monsters, bandits, and powerful unknown forces. During his journey, Thorgal will encounter characters previously known from the comics and visit vast, meticulously crafted locations.

Thorgal aims to interest existing fans of the series, attract new fans of fantasy and introduce this classic comic to RPG enthusiasts.

name: Seagulls: Crappy Situation
description: Get ready for an epic odyssey on the high seas! Take aim with your trusty slingshot and fight against the dreaded seagulls, explore the depths and expand your raft. Gather your crew or play solo – the ocean awaits!

name: Super Sami Roll 2
description: A colorful 3D platformer with rolling-physics based movement. Sami and Vera are back and they brought new friends with their own unique abilities. Roll, grapple and bounce around like never before in this new epic adventure.

name: Human Eater Idle
description: Earn experience points by completing levels and defeating enemies to level up your stickman and make them stronger and more powerful. With so many challenges to face and abilities to unlock, Human Merge Idle is a fun and unique game that you won't want to put down!

name: Ghost Yantra
description: "Ghost Yantra" is a hand-drawn 2D Hack ’n' Slash Parkour game set in a branching Indian Cyberpunk city. Embark on a journey as Narak, a gun-for-hire, who after failing to stop a catastrophic event is on a quest for redemption and to fight for his freedom.

name: Twitch Party
description: Mini-game platform fully playable in Twitch chat! You can find a quiz, a fair price, a pictionary etc. there! If you're a streamer, this is the platform you need to play with your community!

name: Empolicy
description: Online strategy in a fantasy world with single-player options. Explore the world, expand the borders of your polis, build settlements and produce goods. Immerse yourself in the role of a powerful tycoon of the city-republic, choose your path - magic, diplomacy, espionage or war.

name: BUS: Bro U Survived
description: Get ready for a crazy drive across Fang island! Gather your friends for this 1-4 player cooperative looting action game. Save people from the zombie apocalypse, craft and expand your base and turn your bus into a real beast! Escape the island and uncover its conspiracies in BUS: Bro U Survived.

name: Nightfall Conquest
description: "Nightfall Conquest" is a co-op, online survival game game where players fight darkness on a cursed island, uniting against evil, upgrading skills in real-time, and engaging in cooperative multiplayer. Face dynamic enemies and enjoy immersive combat to restore peace.

name: Communion
description: A mystery game where the clues are in every corner and death is not the end of the game, just another beginning.

name: GlaiveBound
description: Explore a magical world full of puzzles, treacherous dungeons, and fearsome foes, in a Zelda-inspired co-op adventure.

name: Space Show Edition 17
description: The year is 2085, the year of the 17th Space Show. It's the most watched reality show in the solar system. 13 million contestants compete against each other in weaponized spaceships for the prize of immortality.

name: Geometry raid
description: 《Geometry Raid》is a rogue-lite space slash shooter game, the game combines classic barrage shooting and sword slash game elements. By driving a two-part ship,you can shoot and swing tail to crush the enemy . The game focuses on hardcore physics simulation and maximizing the melee slash experience.

name: Royal Affairs: AI Romance
description: Royal Affairs is a date sim game where the use of AI not only makes the characters and stories come alive, but also makes every palace romance and strategic conspiracy come to life. Players will experience the highly interactive and personalized choices brought by AI technology, and every decision will affect your power and love path. From in-depth conversational interactions to the details of giving birth and raising children, AI makes everything extremely real, providing a royal life experience full of challenges and fun. Get ready to explore the medieval kingdom empowered by AI and start your palace romance adventure.

name: Black Ocean
description: "Let's play with me, horses of the gods, I'm ready, come to my sea."This is a deck building card game where the journey to prevent the 'black sea' that warps the world.Be a reasoner and work with your colleagues through a twisted, dreamy puppet show.

name: CEO Sim: GameDev
description: CEO Sim: GameDev is an economic simulation game for managing an IT game development company. Take on the role of the head of a young company and develop your project. Implement your business strategy and lead your company to prosperity!

name: Enterprise: Space Agency Simulator
description: Take the helm of a cutting-edge space agency with the mission to explore and exploit the Solar system. Realize the historical, and futuristic mission to establish humanity as the Interplanetary species.
